scripts.setup: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.start-dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run start-dev"
scripts.start-university: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start-university" "cd frontend && npm run start-university"
scripts.start-secure: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start-secure" "cd frontend && npm run start-secure"
scripts.start-windows: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run start-windows"
